item.title: KTR tears into Gadwal MLA Krishna Mohan Reddy over Congress defection, questions unkept promises
item.description:
<![CDATA[KTR tears into Gadwal MLA Krishna Mohan Reddy over Congress defection, questions unkept promises
At the Gadwala Garjana Sabha, BRS working president KT Rama Rao launched a blistering attack on Gadwal MLA Bandla Krishna Mohan Reddy for defecting to the Congress. Accusing him of betraying voters and failing to deliver on key promises, KTR questioned the rationale behind the switch and criticised the Congress for triggering opportunistic defections.
By Telangana Today Published Date - 13 Septembe...]]>
item.author: Telangana Today

item.title: Gadwal Samsthan to continue centuries-old traditions during Navratri
item.description:
<![CDATA[HYDERABAD
The Gadwal Samsthan, one of the oldest and largest Samsthans in India with a history spanning over 400 years, has reaffirmed its commitment to cultural preservation and religious patronage through upcoming offerings and programmes.
Krishna Ram Bhupal of Gadwal Samsthan announced that during the nine days of Dasara and Navratri, Gadwal sarees will be presented to Maa Jogulamba Ammavaru, the presiding deity at Alampur in Gadwal district.
Maa Jogulamba, revered as one of the 18 Maha Sh...]]>
